obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_13_0: Once upon a time, a LEGEND&was whispered among shadows.
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_43_0: This is the legend of&  ^3   DELTA RUNE
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_98_0: For millenia, LIGHT and DARK&have lived in balance^6,%
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_113_0: But if this harmony&were to shatter...
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_170_0: The sky will run&black with terror
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_205_0: And the land will&crack with fear.
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_219_0: The EARTH will draw&her final breath.
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_356_0: Only they can seal the fountains
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_451_0: The geyser that&gives this land form-
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_459_0: Stands tall at the&center of the kingdom.
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_466_0: But recently, another fountain&has appeared on the horizon...
obj_legend_slash_Draw_0_gml_473_0: And with it^1, the balance of&LIGHT and DARK begins to shift...
